TaxEngine.name: TaxEngine
TaxEngine.description: A tax engine represents both an instance of a tax engine provider as well as the merchant credentials for that specific instance. When Subscription Management calculates tax on an order item, it sends a request through Subscription Management Tax Calculation API to an external tax engine. The Salesforce tax engine record contains information passed to the external tax engine, such as

Description.description: The description of the tax engine provider and merchant credential.

ExternalReference.description: Shows information about the external platform used for the tax engine.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

MerchantCredentialId.description: Looks up to the merchant credential setup entity in Salesforce. CommerceTax Tax Calculation API sends this information to the external tax engine for use in the tax calculation process.

SellerCode.description: Seller code of the transaction for which the tax engine integration log was captured.

Status.description: Shows the status of the tax engine.

TaxEngineAddress.description: The compound form of the tax engine address. Read-only. See Address Compound Fields for details on compound address fields. Used in case the request doesn’t contain a Ship To address.

TaxEngineCity.description: Details for the tax engine address. Maximum size is 40 characters.

TaxEngineCountry.description: Details for the tax engine address. Maximum size is 80 characters.

TaxEngineGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the tax engine address. See Compound Field Considerations and Limitations for details on geolocation compound fields.

TaxEngineLatitude.description: Used with TaxEngineLongitude to specify the precise geolocation of a tax engine address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places. See Compound Field Considerations and Limitations for details on geolocation compound fields.

TaxEngineLongitude.description: Used with TaxEngineLatitude to specify the precise geolocation of a tax engine address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places. See Compound Field Considerations and Limitations for details on geolocation compound fields.

TaxEngineName.description: The name of the tax engine.

TaxEnginePostalCode.description: Details for the tax engine address. Postal code maximum size is 20 characters.

TaxEngineProviderId.description: The Id of the tax engine provider.

TaxEngineState.description: Details for the tax engine address. State maximum size is 80 characters.

TaxEngineStreet.description: Details for the tax engine address. Maximum of 255 characters.

TaxPrvdAccountIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the external tax provider’s account. This field is only available if Commerce Subscriptions is enabled for your org. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

Type.description: Specifies the tax engine used to calculate tax. This field is only available if Commerce Subscriptions is enabled for your org. Available in API version 63.0 and later.
